title: New: Rosie Tucker – Spinster Cycle
body:
Getting dumped in a laundromat is perhaps not as uncommon as you might believe – those places are just full of heightened tensions and pressures.

Writing a song about it however might be a first, and this latest brilliant track from LA’s **Rosie Tucker** tackles it in style. There’s just so much personality and character to the songwriting here, that leads to a real sense of belief in the heartbreaking yet somehow bleakly comical lyrical content. Check out _Spinster Cycle_ below.

_we separate even though we’ve got sparks_
